Name: Newton Going Home
About the game: Newton the kitten is a tourist and very curious kitten He went to travel with his owner to an island for a vacation, but when it was time to leave Newton went to discover new things on the island and got lost! His owner is waiting for him at the kiosk so he can catch the plane and leave, but Newton doesn't know the way to get home Newton is lost on the island, only you can help him! You need to unscramble the hexagonal tiles to form a path where Newton will be able to reach his owner Your challenge is to connect all the tiles with food so that Newton the kitten can reach its owner without hunger, otherwise Newton will die of hunger on the way Rivers, mountains and bridges will challenge you to find the best way Cats and Puzzle: A cute and pleasant experience Rotate the camera freely with the right mouse button 52 uniquely assembled levels 5 island themes with many additional mechanics Original music and effects Configure graphics for your computer Steam Cloud and Steam Achievements
